overview: A provocative meditation and exploration of Matthew Camp's formative sexual memories.  Shot in the form of a hybrid documentary/experimental film/art project, Camp will share a distinct sexual experience from his life, then recreate the formative sexual memory in explicit detail with a new partner.  Blending reality and fantasy, the aim is to offer a true, authentic â€˜what you see is what you get' portrayal of Matthew Camp.
title: Camp Chaos
